::FZ/Prowl/Repressor::

FZ sighs, his scanners reporting that gunfire was coming from one of 
the Maximals again. Did they all want to be exterminated? He was 
tempted to order complete destruction of the Cybertrnian Fire and of 
the Maximal faction, but that wasn't in his best interests. He had 
plans for the Maximals yet..

"Not officially. Exterminate any attacking Maximal, though." He 
replies to Shokaract. He then opens a comm channel to Iron Raptor.

"Tell your Maximals to stop firing, now. My troops are getting jumpy, 
and I will soon be forced to order extermination of your base and 
your people." He says through the comm, ending the transmission and 
looking toward Iron Raptor's direction.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl sighs in frustration as Necromancer opens fire on the Alliance 
again. For a second he wondered what the punishment for disobeying 
orders like this would be in Striker's old group.

"Stop firing!" he says over the comm to Necromancer.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor spins around, hearing gunfire. He aims his missile 
launcher, firing two missiles at Necromancer, backed by two dozen 
laser shots from his rifle.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Shokaract over commlink to Zardus: Zardus, are we firing again?..
> 
> .
> Necromancer lost his patience with the situation, "No you're 
dieing." he
> fired five fireballs at Shockarackt, smiling as the weapon recoiled 
with
> each shot.
